name: flat-fizzy

0.2.0.name: flat-fizzy
0.2.0.description: A flat syntax theme based off of Fizzy for Atom by jglovier

readme:
## Flat Fizzy Syntax Theme

Flat Fizzy is a light syntax theme for [Atom](http://atom.io/) inspired by [jglovier's Fizzy Theme](https://github.com/jglovier/fizzy)'s syntax highlighting color scheme. It features less bright colors, with primary colors on a white background. It is a syntax theme only, and will not affect the Atom UI. (Works well with One Light UI theme)

### Installation

Run the following command:

```sh
apm install fizzy
```

or search for

```sh
Flat Fizzy
```

in the Themes search box

Then go to `Atom > Preferences > Themes` and in the `Syntax Themes` dropdown, select `Flat Fizzy` from the list.
